title: endha vidhamum
sahitya:
enda vidamum undanaruL vandiDumaiyE enak

(kenda)



anupallavi



santatamum undanaDi cindanai seyyaadavena

(kenda)



caraNam



manamada kariyaivenRu malaraDiyil nilai ninRu

unadu perumai pugazhndu ulagasukhamadi nondu
